item.title: Brief Synopsis of the Scientific Career of T. R. Hurd
item.description: arXiv:2408.16891v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: As an introduction to a Special Issue of International Journal of Theoretical and Applied Finance in Honour of the Memory of Thomas Robert Hurd we present a brief synopsis of Tom Hurd's scientific career and a bibliography of his scientific publications.
item.dc:creator: Matheus R. Grasselli, Lane P. Hughston
